planets.render

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • planets.render.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    In charge of drawing planets to the SimulationPane and updating their position at the request of the Scheduler.
    Author:
    David Cosby
